messages.body:
Deutsche Bank returns to profit in third quarter

https://pageone.ng/2020/10/28/deutsche-bank-returns-to-profit-in-third-quarter/

$DB $HSBC

links.title: Deutsche Bank returns to profit in third quarter | PageOne
links.description: (Bloomberg) - Deutsche Bank (DB) on Wednesday reported a €182m (£164m, $214m) net profit in the third quarter, the first quarterly profit since Q1 2019, amid a strong performance in its investment bank arm and ongoing restructuring. In the same quarter in 2019, Deutsche posted a net loss of €832m.

links.title: SA Ideas: HSBC, UBS results show that European banks may be too cheap
links.description: U.S. investors looking for big bargains in the financial sector may want to hunt on the other side of the Atlantic. Some major European banks are sporting cheap valuations, and saw sharp gains in their share prices recently after reporting much better than expected quarterly results.

messages.body: U.K. based investment bank $HSBC soared nearly 7% overnight after the bank beat estimates & signaled it may resume limited dividend payments, as well as accelerating a restructuring plan, despite profits dropping by 36%. Shares are now up +4%  at $21.55. The stock is still down -44.87% in 2020, on a market capitalization of about $85B.

messages.body:
Stocks Are Mixed After Monday’s Selloff  $CAT $LLY $HOG $HSBC $SAN 

https://newsfilter.io/a/d311275c599d4ec2c2e5c06feb243b07

links.title: Stocks Are Mixed After Monday's Selloff
links.description: Tuesday's trading reflected a concern about a growing wave of coronavirus cases in the U.S. and Western Europe. Stocks and sectors seen as most insulated from the pandemic and stay-at-home orders outperformed those more sensitive to an economic recovery. Growth-oriented technology, communication services, and consumer discretionary sectors of the S&P 500 rose, as did the defensive utilities and health care groups.

messages.body:
$HSBC (+6.9% pre) HSBC’s Hong Kong shares jump nearly 5% after third-quarter earnings beat estimates - CNBC

http://ooc.bz/l/62703

links.title: HSBC is scheduled to report third-quarter earnings today. Here's what to expect
links.description: SINGAPORE - HSBC, Europe's largest bank by assets, is expected to report another hit to earnings as it attempts to recover from the economic shock from the coronavirus pandemic. The London-headquartered bank is scheduled to release its financial report card for the July-to-September quarter on Tuesday at 12 p.m. HK/SIN.

messages.body:
$HSBC
HSBC(5 HK) Q3 net USD 1.35bln vs. Prev. USD 2.97bln Y/Y, adj. pre-tax fell 21% Y/Y to USD 4.3bln vs. Exp. USD 2.8bln, rev. USD 12.1bln vs. Exp. USD 11.8bln, considers a conservative dividend and expects to communicate revised dividend policy after Feb.
Source: https://seekingalpha.com/market-news
